Reviews.Title: Nikonn D7100 with 18-300 VR Lens Package
Reviews.Author: Ricky
Reviews.Content: Package ordered is exactly what I received and was received by the time as promised.  The package was a good package even though the Nikon Case is too small for the camera and 18-300 lens to fit inside without taking the lens off.  No place for the flash if you do that.  Battery pack is just that.  It is not the MB-D15 which they did not list it as such but I thought they were one of the same.  Overall, I'm very pleased with this order.  The camera and lens is a great combination! It is still rated as 5 Stars!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 18-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Battery Grip for D7100 + <6> Spare EN-EL15 Battery +
<7> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <9> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-300mm VR Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Battery & Grip + HDMI Cable + Filter Set
